entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING ENDED, Port Elgin
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:31 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wiarton Airport 3:37 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

Temperature: -0.3°C

Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 94 %

Dewpoint: -1.1°C

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of drizzle. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of drizzle changing to 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening and overnight. Fog patches dissipating overnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming north 30 before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 19 January 2023
